title: Doctor critical of Trump's COVID response talks vaccine efficacy
author: Good Morning America
description: Dr. Rick Bright, now a member of Joe Biden's coronavirus task force, discusses problems caused by Trump's transition process and new vaccine learnings.
cleaned_text: 2020 Doctor critical of Trump's COVID response talks vaccine efficacy Dr. Rick Bright, now a member of Joe Biden's coronavirus task force, discusses problems caused by Trump's transition process and new vaccine learnings.
